title: GAME OF THRONES Season 8 Episode 1 Breakdown & Details You Missed!
author: Think Story
comment: WINTER IS HERE! Also Needle isn't Valyrian and that was obviously dragonstone. I knew I shouldn't have gone toe to toe with Tyrion in a drinking competition at 4am when I wrote this. I'll do better next ep!

Bran : Knows everything, does nothing.

Jon   : Does everything, knows nothing.
Needle is made of castle forged steel..... and Gendry  has wagons filled with dragon glass and  not coal

2:06 you are completely wrong here, this is a depiction of the red wedding, Lanister lion eating a Tully fish, a wolf (Rob Stark) hanging beneth the Twins ( the sigil of house Frey), and a flayed men (Aka Bolton) holding a wolfs head (the head of the Robs direwolf)

Sansa's "used to think you're the most clever man" does not refer to Cersei's pregnancy but what Tyrion had said before: that the Lannister army is coming to help out in the North.
Sansa knows it's not going to happen.
description:
We break down season 8 episode 1 "Winterfell" of HBO's hit fantasy series "Game of Thrones", exploring its ending and recapping some of the hidden details you may have missed along the way.
